name: magic-room
effect: For five turns (including this one), passive effects of held items are ignored, and Pokémon will not use their held items.
short_effect: Negates held items for five turns.

flavor_text.sword-shield: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s held items lose their effects for five turns.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's held items lose their effects for five turns.
